title.narrative: OUTPUT 34 DRINKING WATER SUPPLY

description.narrative: Output 34 An additional 250,000 people in underserved and recently freed guinea worm endemic communities have sustainable use of improved drinking water supply services, which contributes to Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 009 : 54% of population have sustainable and equitable access to and use of basic sanitation services underpinned by improved hygiene practices and sustainable water services by 2016.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 34 An additional 250,000 people in underserved and recently freed guinea worm endemic communities have sustainable use ofimproved drinking water supply services

description.narrative: UNICEF demonstrated sustainable delivery of improved water facilities through the provision of safe, sustainable water supplies to over 27,000 people; supported by the demonstration of market-based approaches to deliver community water supplies and community and household level water safety plans as part of the National Drinking Water Quality Management Framework. | Status:Met | As-of Date:21/12/2017

title.narrative: Communities implementing water safety plans
Number of people using improved drinking water services as a direct result of UNICEF interventions

Number of Communities implementing water safety plans

actual.value: 2017:Water Safety Planning piloting is in progress 12 communities with piped water systems

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Existing sustainability compact or sustainability plan with evidence of continous monitoring

actual.value: 2017:There is a Sustainability Compact in place which was monitored in terms of the commitments of the parties involved.
